1/* $NetBSD: nametokva.c,v 1.2 2012/07/22 14:27:36 darrenr Exp $ */
2
3/*
4 * Copyright (C) 2012 by Darren Reed.
5 *
6 * See the IPFILTER.LICENCE file for details on licencing.
7 *
8 * Id: nametokva.c,v 1.1.1.2 2012/07/22 13:44:39 darrenr Exp $
9 */
10
11#include "ipf.h"
12
13#include <sys/ioctl.h>
14#include <fcntl.h>
15
16ipfunc_t nametokva(name, iocfunc)
17 char *name;
18 ioctlfunc_t iocfunc;
19{
20 ipfunc_resolve_t res;
21 int fd;
22
23 strncpy(res.ipfu_name, name, sizeof(res.ipfu_name));
24 res.ipfu_addr = NULL;
25 fd = -1;
26
27 if ((opts & OPT_DONTOPEN) == 0) {
28 fd = open(IPL_NAME, O_RDONLY);
29 if (fd == -1)
30 return NULL;
31 }
32 (void) (*iocfunc)(fd, SIOCFUNCL, &res);
33 if (fd >= 0)
34 close(fd);
35 if (res.ipfu_addr == NULL)
36 res.ipfu_addr = (ipfunc_t)-1;
37 return res.ipfu_addr;
38}
39
